com.dhbikoff.breakout

Class Paddle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShapeDrawable
      • com.dhbikoff.breakout.Paddle

  • public class Paddle
extends ShapeDrawable
    Represents the game paddle. Extends a ShapeDrawable to include a color value and methods for setting the paddle's location on screen.

    • Method Detail

      • initCoords

        public void initCoords(int width,
              int height)
        Sets the paddle's dimensions and coordinates based on screen width and height.
        Parameters:
        width - screen width
        height - screen height

      • drawPaddle

        public void drawPaddle(Canvas canvas)
        Draws the paddle to a canvas.
        Parameters:
        canvas - graphics canvas

      • movePaddle

        public void movePaddle(int x)
        Sets the paddle's coordinates. The paddle may move across the screen along the x axis only.
        Parameters:
        x - x axis value of touch event. Used to calculate the center of the paddle.
